HERO.SUBTITLE: Hello, I'm Daniel Zambrano Juca
HERO.TITLE: Chemical Engineer & Full-Stack Developer
HERO.DESCRIPTION: A fusion of engineering and creativity, specializing in building robust digital solutions and intuitive user experiences. My passion is to transform complex ideas into functional and elegant realities.

SERVICES.TITLE: My Professional Services
SERVICES.CARD_1_DESC: Modeling and simulation of chemical processes to optimize efficiency and industrial production.
SERVICES.CARD_2_DESC: Building complete web applications, from the database to the final user interface.
SERVICES.CARD_3_DESC: Data analysis, machine learning, and visualizations to extract insights and predict trends.

ABOUT.PAGE_SUBTITLE: A glimpse into my background, my skills, and what I'm passionate about.
ABOUT.INTRO_P1: Ever since I discovered programming, I've been on a constant journey of learning and creating. My background as a Chemical Engineer gave me a solid foundation in problem-solving and analytical thinking, skills I now apply to build efficient and robust software solutions.
ABOUT.INTRO_P2: I specialize in Full-Stack development, with a deep interest in how data can transform businesses. I enjoy working across the entire product lifecycle, from conceptualization and UI/UX design to backend implementation and deployment.

PROJECTS.PAGE_SUBTITLE: A collection of my work in web development, data science, and more.

CONTACT.PAGE_SUBTITLE: Have a project in mind or just want to say hello? Feel free to reach out.
